Package cz.cuni.mff.dancejova.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Apple
    Constructs and renders an apple that Pac-Man eats to get score.
    Block
    Creates and renders a solid block in the level map
    Game
    The main class
    Ghost
    Constructs and renders the ghosts
    Images
    Provides using images of characters from a source in .png format
    Level
    Renders and controls what is happening in the level's map
    Life
    Constructs and renders a life icon seen in the upper right corner
    Player
    Renders and validates Pac-Man's movement
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Player.Direction
    Provides rendering the head looking in the right direction
